Room.Name: Jungle Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a clearing between the village and a thick tropical jungle.
Room.LongDescription: The beach is not far from here, and a road is cut through the jungle which seems to go in the direction of the sound of the surf. Tall palms and heavy banana trees are overhead, and the ground is covered with soft ferns and creeping vines. The back doors of several buildings open onto this cleared area, and garbage has been thrown into heaps nearby.
